casebody.data:
2002-1971 (La. 10/25/02)

Vana ANDREWS v. Margaret DUFOUR, et al. No. 2002-CC-1971. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Ford Motor Co.; — Defendant; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. K, No. 1992-13762; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2002-C-1044.

Denied.

JOHNSON, J., recused.
